resources.string: The Lost are proof that eternal existence is not the same as fairy-tale immortality; for some, it comes at a terrible price. People become Lost through endless cycles of death and rebirth that wither their souls until there's nothing left.
Lost are weak to Strike, Ice, and Nature damage.
The origin of the Ancients, and any knowledge of their civilization, has been lost to dusty memory. All that remains are relics: crumbled monuments, ruins of cities, and legions of skeletal warriors.
Ancient Guardians are weak to Strike, Lightning, and Void damage.
The intermingling of Azoth and nature is most evident in the Angry Earth, a variety of plant-like creatures so named for their fierce guardianship of the wilderness of Aeternum.
Angry Earth are weak to Slash and Fire damage.
The Corrupted serve as the immortal thralls of an ancient and unknowable force that warps all within its reach.
Corrupted are weak to Thrust, Arcane, and Nature damage.
The most reliable sources for acquiring Azoth are completing Quests and closing Corruption Breaches.
You'll rarely collect Azoth from defeating enemies, but the likelihood can be increased with certain item perks.
Rest at your Camp to recover Health before going into unknown areas.
Craft basic items, food, and potions at your camp to avoid upkeep.
You can unlock upgrades to your Camp by completing Special Quests at Levels 15, 25, 40, and 55. These Quests are located in Monarch's Bluffs, Cutlass Keys, Restless Shore, and Edengrove.
Place a Camp near important places. You can then Respawn there in case of an unfortunate death.
Camps have a limited range in which you can Respawn. If a Camp Icon turns Red that means you've traveled too far away and won't be able to Respawn there.
Defeating an enemy with 2 different weapons will grant half of the Weapon Mastery points to both of those weapons.
Weapon Mastery Respecs are free until you reach Level 10 with that weapon. Find out what works best for you.
If your Damage Numbers are Blue , the enemy has resistance to your Damage Type. Try using another weapon to deal more damage!
Strong attacks are Yellow and deal more damage. Weak attacks are Blue and deal less damage. Both are determined by your physical or elemental damage type.
There are 3 physical damage types: Slash, Thrust, and Strike. Find out which damage type is best against your enemies.
There are 6 elemental damage types: Arcane, Fire, Ice, Lightning, Nature, and Void. Use gems to add elemental damage to your weapons.
Gems which convert damage to elemental damage cannot be placed into weapons that deal that damage by default. For example, a Ruby cannot be added to a Fire Staff.
Attribute Respecs are free until you are Level 20. Take advantage of this time to figure out where you want your Points to go, and avoid costly Respecs in the future!
There's no penalty for losing a Duel so don't be afraid to take on all challengers!
Ammo is not consumed during Duels.
You can turn your PVP flag on and off inside of Settlements, Outposts, Watchtowers, and at Spirit Shrines.
Before leaving a Territory, be sure to double-check if you're Flagged for PVP!
If the enemy has a Skull over their health bar, don't engage! This indicates a level, and difficulty, much higher than yours. Aeternum does not show mercy.

Weapon Coatings are powerful, short-term buffs that you apply to a weapon to give yourself an advantage against a certain family of enemies, such as the Corrupted or the Ancients. Coatings work on ranged and magical weapons, too!
If a character glows White during an attack, they can't be interrupted, except by Crowd Control Status Effects (Slow, Root, and Stun).
The Shield's stats only benefit the player if a Sword is equipped.
The Rapier's speedy cuts pair well with other Intelligence-based weapons such as Staves and Gauntlets.
For the best defense, combine Uninterruptible Berserk and Defy Death to force your way through enemies, then recover with Berserking Refresh!
The Spear's Zoning Abilities and Dexterity-based scaling make it a great pairing for Ranged Weapons.
The Great Axe is excellent for controlling smaller fights, with options for both damaging enemy groups or pulling heavy hitters away from teammates.
The War Hammer deals Strike damage, which is effective against Ancients and Lost.
While in Aim Mode with the bow you can Charge Up your shot by holding the attack button.
Remember to lay some ground traps nearby if you find a good place to snipe from.
The Fire Staff can be utilized for large Crowd Control, or stacking Burn Statuses to a devastating effect.
If there are no allies around, you can always use Orb of Protection at your feet to Buff yourself.
If you want to use a Life Staff ability on yourself, press [{hint1}] + the ability key.
The Ice Gauntlet is excellent at hindering enemy progression. Use the Slowing Effects to gain better positioning or give teammates an opening to do more damage.
The Void Gauntlet's numerous Buffs and Debuffs make it very effective in group combat.
Enemies in the world will retreat and become temporarily invulnerable if they are led too far from home, or cannot reach you.
Join a Company and fight alongside your friends against the Corrupted. Also, siege opposing Faction Territories.

Only Companies can declare war and siege Territories to take them over. As Governor of a Territory, your Company earns coin through upkeep, gets huge discounts on Fast Travel, and contributes to the success of your whole Faction.
Communicate and Group up easily with company members. See when members were last online and get access to a shared amount of Coin in the Company Treasury.
Check the Resource Locations section of the Map to find out what biome the Resources you need are typically found in.
Food isn’t just for recovering after a fight! There are foods that increase your chances of getting rare crafting materials and foods that improve your crafting skill, as well.
When crafting equipment, you can use higher-tier secondary materials to improve the item’s gear score. The higher the tier of the secondary resource, the more its gear score is improved!

When crafting Consumables, you can use higher-tier ingredients to increase your chances of getting additional items from that craft. The higher the tier of the ingredients, the better chances you have!
Looking for specific ingredients for a Recipe? Pin the Recipe to track it.
Skilled Arcanists can also craft powerful Potions that can save your life in a tough fight!
Each skill that crafts equipment can also craft a unique consumable with powerful effects.
Trophies are items crafted by Furnishers that can give powerful Buffs when placed in your House.
If you want to see all existing Perks in the game, go to a Trading Post and choose "Select Perks" in the Browse tab.
The top-end of the potential Gear Score range for a crafted item increases as your Trade Skill increases. This allows you to add more Azoth to improve your crafting.
Craft a Topaz Gypsum Attunement Potion at any Arcana Station or Tier 5 Camp. When attuned, you can earn Topaz Gypsum as a random drop from level 55+ enemies.
Chat can be accessed at the Respawn screen by pressing [{hint1}]. Check in with your team and see where you are needed most.
A Dull Blade is More Dangerous
Items take damage any time you die. Remember to Repair them before returning to the fight. Nothing is worse than a sword that breaks mid-swing.
Prepare yourself before entering an Elite Stronghold. And definitely bring friends!
Elite Chests can only be claimed once per day.
Elite Strongholds are some of the toughest challenges in Aeternum. Good luck!
It's wise to place a Camp before entering an Elite Stronghold. You won't regret it.
Items you have equipped do not count against your overall carry Weight. Use this to your advantage while hauling that last bit of Iron Ore back to the Settlement.
Your Equipment Load determines how you will Dodge. A LIGHT Equipment Load will allow you to roll out of danger when Dodging.
To equip a skin, Left-Click a weapon or piece of armor in your Inventory and select the "Change Skin" option to equip any skin you own for that item.
Dye can be applied to different parts of each item. Make sure you try out different combinations before committing to a color scheme.
Items with higher rarity generally have special effects or gem sockets. Make sure to weigh all the benefits, not just gear score.
Want to tank? Socket a Carnelian Gem into a weapon to unlock Taunts on some abilities.
Salvaging items gives you Repair Parts and can sometimes reduce overall Weight. Remember to Salvage weapons and armor you aren't using.
Crafting in a Settlement can pull resources from Inventory or Storage, no need to haul all those ingredients around.
Equipped items take damage on use and on death.
Press the Hotkey Shortcut to Repair or Salvage an item in one click. [{hint1}] + Left-Click for quick Repair and [{hint2}] + Left-Click for quick Salvage.
Prevent Salvaging items in your Inventory by clicking the item and selecting "Lock" [{hint1}]. A lock icon will appear on the item when it is locked.
Clever disciples who fight with cunning for the sake of truth and progress.
Proud warriors who fight with honor for glory and self-improvement.
Divine champions who fight with conviction for righteousness and justice.
Join a Faction to flag for PVP, control Territory, and participate in Wars.
Every settlement has a unique item cart in it. Visit a settlement controlled by your faction to claim free items. Be sure to check back regularly!
Some PVP Missions will be Reset if you die while they're in progress. Turn in finished PVP Missions as soon as you can to guarantee Rewards for you and your Faction!
Complete PVE Missions to increase your Faction Reputation, increase your XP, and earn access to better Faction Gear.
Faction Representatives sell reliable Armor and Weapons. Consider purchasing some if you're looking for something specific.
Hunting Missions show you where to start, but a good hunter will explore the surrounding area in search of prey.
Earn Bonus Rewards from the first 3 Faction Missions you complete each day!
Fish bite more often in deeper water!
Different fish can be found in salt water versus fresh water. If you can collect it, it means it is fresh water.
Each Territory contains a unique Legendary Fish.
Most fish are native to particular Territories, except Salmon and Pike which can be found all over.
When fish are jumping from a hotspot, it is active and will allow you to catch rare fish more often. Hotspots without jumping fish need time to replenish.
Hotspots are the best place to catch rarer fish. They increase your odds considerably.
No bites? If you're having trouble catching fish, then try finding some water. Fish don't live on land.
Hotspots come in three categories: Broad, Rare, and Secret. Secret Hotspots offer the chance to catch the rarest fish, but they deplete the quickest.
As your Fishing Level rises, more Hotspots become available for discovery.
To discover a hotspot, you must be of high enough fishing level, then walk within its proximity.
Fishing in active hotspots will get you bites almost immediately.
Different hotspots offer different fish to catch depending on the Territory and water type.
As your fishing level rises, you will be able to cast further.
Find Fishing Master Shields to start the Fishing Quests.
Win Fishing Armor by completing the Fishing Quests.
Every time you hook or catch a fish you get Fishing XP, which helps advance your Fishing Level.
It is easier to overcome a fighting fish with a longer cast.
A longer cast can be reeled in quicker, making fish easier to beat.
Larger or rarer fish are more likely to put up a fight.
Any Bait will decrease the time taken to get bites.
Press [{hint1}] to enter Fishing Mode, then Left-Click to cast.
Better fishing poles can cast further, have higher durability, faster line tension recovery, and increased chance of catching rarer fish.
Equip the Fishing Pole into the Inventory Tool Slot to use it.
Get Fish Filets and other bounty from Salvaging your fish.
Some Legendary Fish can be used to decorate your House.
Some Legendary Fish can be used to craft a Fishing Trophy.
Some Legendary Fish can be used to make Attribute Bonus Food.
Oysters, Clams, Snails, and Electric Eels can be Salvaged into Bait.
Fish filet can be obtained by salvaging most common fish.
Firm Fish Filet can be obtained by Salvaging most uncommon fish.
Tender Fish Filet can be obtained by Salvaging some rare fish like Paddlefish, Swordfish, and Speartooth Shark.
Delicate Fish Filet can be obtained by Salvaging Electric Eels and Swordfish.
Have you found one yet? A Trial is a rare event where you and your friends fight a deadly, legendary creature.
Seek out Scott Newman in Cleave's Point Outpost or talk to your faction representative to compete in this 20 vs 20 match.
There are 4 tiers of Houses you can purchase. Each improves your Fast Travel cooldown, Max Storage placement, and total Furniture placement.
Trophies you place in your House give you benefits all over the island, not just in the Territory the House is in.
You can Fast Travel to your House for free, once every few hours, by selecting your house icon on the Map. The higher tier the House, the lower the cooldown is.
You can place 1-4 Chests in each House, depending on the House tier. Each increases your Max Settlement Storage for the Territory that House is in. The rarer the Storage Chest, the more it increases.
Any Furniture you 'Pick Up' in your home goes into your Settlement Storage for that Territory, instead of your Inventory.
All Furniture in a House goes into your Settlement Storage for that Territory when you abandon it.
You can only own 1 House in a Territory at a time.
You can own up to 3 houses in the world if you meet the level, Territory, and monetary requirements.
You can get a 50% discount for your first house.
Not all houses are the same. Some are more spacious than others which increases their tier. These houses require a higher standing in that Territory and will cost more gold.
Owning a house has perks, but only if you pay your upkeep. If upkeep is due, you will no longer be able to enjoy Fast Travel or trophy buffs until they are paid.
Want to Fast Travel to your House, but you haven't paid your upkeep? Pay them from the Map [{hint1}] to re-enable your Housing Perks instantly.
You can only place 5 different types of Trophies in each House you own. 15 total if you own 3 Houses.
You cannot place more than 1 of the same type of Trophy in your House, but you can place 1 of the same type of Trophy in each of your 3 Houses. The Bonuses stack if you do!
You can view what Housing Trophy Buffs you have active in your Character Bio page.
Place your Furniture and Decorations in your House carefully to gain points in your Decoration Score. With skill and luck, your house might be chosen to be on display to the whole Settlement.

Want to up the curb appeal of your House? Place more items in it, then complete Missions and defeat monsters in the Territory your House is in. Rarer Furnishings cause your curb appeal to increase faster.
Remember to take a break when you've been playing New World continuously for a long period of time.
Take screenshots with [F7]. You can also hide your UI by pressing [{hint1}+{hint2}] to get the most out of the scenery.
Between a Rock and a Hard Place
If you're exploring and become stuck, you can free yourself by either typing "/stuck" or selecting "Unstuck" from the Game Menu.
Nothing to say? Press [{hint1}] to bring up Emotes.
Lying prone [{hint1}] or crouching [{hint2}] in vegetation will make it significantly harder for enemy players to see your nameplate.
Visit Settlements and Spirit Shrines to expand the network of locations to which you can Fast Travel.
If you follow the tall, blue pillars of light, you'll likely discover a Spirit Shrine.
Increasing certain Trade Skills will unlock higher levels of Resource Tracking on your Compass.
If you're headed somewhere specific, open the map [{hint1}] and Right-Click the destination to place a point. This will appear on the compass to help guide you.
Feed your head! Reading Lore Pages on Aeternum awards XP!
Quick pings [{hint1}] are contextual. Placing one in the environment, PVP enemies, or loot, will ping "Moving Here", "Danger Here", and "Loot Here".
Hold [{hint1}] to open the Ping Wheel for more ping types.
You can mark NPC targets by pressing [{hint1}] while they are under your reticle.
Did you know you can ping directly on your map? Try setting a ping [{hint1}] on your map. You can even use the ping wheel by holding [{hint2}].
The player who commits the killing blow will be awarded PvP XP and Azoth Salt.
A PvP victim must have been flagged for at least 10 minutes to be worth anything to kill. This scales up the longer they are flagged.
PvP XP and Azoth Salt are awarded for overall performance in Outpost Rush or War; not per kill.
Earning XP while flagged will reward Azoth Salt at set intervals.
Revisit your Map regularly to discover if any new Quests have become available.
Always check before heading out to a distant location to see if any Spirit Shrines can hasten your journey.
Main Story Quests will always appear at the top of your Journal, but that doesn't always mean they should be your highest priority.
The best Rewards are generally earned by completing the Final Quests in a chain in each Territory.
It is easy to stay busy on Aeternum. You can use the Main Story section in the Journal to keep up with your next steps.
Every day you will receive Bonus Rewards for the first 3 Faction Missions you complete!
Each Faction has 5 Ranks to climb. Earn Renown from Faction Missions and complete the trial assigned to you to earn glory for your Faction!
Camp Levels can be increased by completing specific Quests. These can be found in the Leveling Rewards page.
Trade items with other players by selecting "Trade" in their social menu.
You can change the titles you've earned through the Bio [{hint1}] screen.
You can open a player's Social Menu by looking directly at them and pressing [{hint1}].
Prevent social interactions by turning on "Do Not Disturb" in the settings menu or using the shortcut "/dnd".
Trading Post Listing Fees are much lower for shorter duration sales, and higher for longer sales.
You can select specific perks for buy orders in the Trading Post, and rarity of sought items too!
To place a Buy Order in the Trading Post, search for the item you want, then create a Custom Order.
Sharpen your Trading Post discoveries by drilling into the item's listings and using item searches.
You can view listings from all Trading Posts by changing your view to "All Settlements".
The spectral crew of the Vendetta haunt the coastal waters of Aeternum as punishment for attempting to escape the island.
Locals believe a powerful, benevolent entity dwells in the deep and protects the fishermen who offer her gifts.
Only legends remain of an apparent "High King" who once sought to unify all Aeternum under his rule.
Tortured Electrogeists roam Deadman's Cove at night. Take extra caution, or visit during the day when it's safer.
Goldstein the Equalizer rules the Isle of Cayo De La Muerte from her throne at Stone Skull Fort.
There are echoes of Periville's citizenry that still haunt the city. Guard against their onslaught, and wait for their anger to dissipate.
Archminister Havelock and his family have made their home at the manor atop Brightwood Isle.
The Greenshapers have sealed this temple with vines and trees. Bring a logging axe!
Stray too far from the path, and you risk being lost to Corruption's tendrils.
The harsh, bitter sun of Brimstone Sands requires proper protection to survive.
The Ancients’ language was lost to the sands of time. Until now…
A monstrous behemoth has awakened in the desert. Local legends refer to it as “The Devourer.”
It is said that Ancients conducted rituals deep inside the heart of a massive wall built between Brimstone Sands and Shattered Mountain.
Crassus and his Corrupted 19th Legion are an eternal threat to the safety and stability of New Corsica.
One of the oldest living humans on Aeternum, Imhotep the Wise, is said to wander the deserts in search of knowledge.
Tread cautiously when navigating the sulfur pools of Brimstone Sands. If the giant lizards don't get you, the boiling, burning water most certainly will...
Sandstone is plentiful in Brimstone Sands, and can be smelted into glass items.
Thirsty? Try cutting down a Cactus for small amounts of Water.
No one knows how Armadillos got to Brimstone Sands, but they seem to be thriving nonetheless.
A great tree has somehow flourished in the middle of Brimstone Sands. Some even say that the tree still blooms high in its branches.
Some believe that a deadly manticore stalks the sands of Brimstone, so travel with care…
Legends say that an Ancient lies sleeping somewhere in Brimstone Sands.
The massive scorpions that prowl the desert have more weapons than mere pincers and claws.
Ancient Glyphs are the key to unlocking chests, exploring sealed ruins, and much more. How many can you find?
Would-be tomb robbers beware: the restless dead sometimes guard their earthly treasures.
Some of the Anubian constructs that prowl Brimstone Sands can be mined for resources.
New Corsica’s gilded facade conceals a viper’s nest of politics, intrigue, and paranoia.
The Legionnaires of Brimstone Sands have lost none of their legendary discipline and fighting skill, despite becoming Corrupted.
Marc Antony founded the 19th “Seaborne” Legion, though they could not save him from ruin at the Battle of Actium.
The dying Queen Cleopatra was brought to Brimstone Sands by the Romans who sought to save her life.
Soulwardens are rare in Brimstone Sands. But with Ancients and Corruption both stirring, that may soon change.
There are legends of mysterious, shape-changing spirits known as ifrit that haunt the wastes of the desert. Some can be bargained with.
If you hear a familiar voice calling from the darkness of the wastelands, do not approach.
Twisted abominations have begun appearing in Brimstone Sands, the products of some Ancient sorcery.
Brimstone Sands has had two great civilizations shape the land over the millennia, the Egyptians and the Romans.
The Anubian Ancients are far more robust than the dusty skeletons that guard other Ancient ruins. Approach with caution.
The circular stone gates scattered across Brimstone Sands are magical as well as magnificent.
Vast streams of azoth flow through the Great Pyramid of Akhet. Hopefully, such power will never be turned to nefarious purposes...
The Angry Earth of Brimstone Sands have no fear of fire, and often employ burning sulfur to destroy their foes.
This road is the first of many tests of strength on the path up the Mangled Heights.
Myrkgard Forest once spanned from the Cleave to the city of Myrkgard, but has now diminished in the presence of Corruption.
Foul rituals are conducted here, including the anointing of Corruption's priesthood.
The Balebane Maw is a protective membrane created by High Priest Oseguera many years ago.
High Priest Oseguera conducts the foulest of rituals at the Temple of Nihilo Visage, located at the peak of Mangled Heights.
Soon after the Taiying Empress began settling the area there was a series of floods.
Empress Zhou Taiying fled from her brother Shang Wu's usurping of her throne in China and washed up in Aeternum.
When the Empress first laid eyes on Borvarn, she completely forgot about her other pet Daisy.
Capture outposts and slay the enemy to score points. First team to 1000 points wins!
Gather infused wood, ore, and hides to upgrade your outposts by building gates and siege weapons. Build a command post to gain powerful offensive and defensive boosts for your team.
Use summoning stones to summon powerful allies at summoning circles. Summon a bear by buying a stone from the armory or gain an ultra-powerful brute ally by donating Azoth at the corrupted portal.
Baroness Hain is the ghost of a long dead noble that haunts the island. Slay her to gain a powerful buff that increases the defense of your team and freezes the enemy score!
Each round lasts for 2 minutes. After the timer ticks down, a deadly ring of fire encircles the arena and begins to shrink.
If you aren’t first, you’re last
The first team to win 3 rounds will win the match and claim victory!
If you’re killed, you can continue to cheer your team on from the viewing box.
The longer a round lasts, the less effective incoming healing becomes.
Get out there and put on a show for the crowd! The announcer is sure to have them prepared for the fight.
Arena wins are a great way to earn PvP Reward Track experience.
War leaders can hold [{hint1}] while placing a ping to make the ping visible to the entire Army.
Armories are accessible from bases and control points.
Attackers must take all 3 control points before the gates can be damaged. Once they are taken, they become Respawn points and access to Armory.

Once all 3 control points are taken, attackers can try to knock down gates and take the control point in the fort. If attackers succeed they will win the war, if attackers fail to claim it, defenders will win the war.
As the war goes on, there will be longer and longer Respawn waves. When soldiers are killed, they will Respawn in the next Respawn wave.
Players earn Battle Tokens by damaging their enemies. With Battle Tokens, players can purchase various items from Armory.
War leaders can hold [{hint1}] while placing a ping to make the ping visible to the entire Army.
The Corrupted Army will attack the fort in waves, with each successive wave becoming stronger.
The Corrupted Army will try to knock down the gates and take a control point within the fort. If players successfully defend the claim point from invasion, they will win.
As the war goes on, there will be longer and longer Respawn waves. When soldiers are killed, they will Respawn in the next Respawn wave.
Players earn Battle Tokens by damaging their enemies. With Battle Tokens, players can purchase various items from Armory.
You can only be revived so many times in Expeditions before having to respawn. Be careful!

Repair Kits are an efficient way to fully Repair an item from any damaged state. Repair Kits are consumed on use, so be sure to wait until the item's durability is low or completely broken prior to using the kit to maximize the efficiency of the Repair Kit.
You're Stuck in Here With ME!
If anyone tries to escape Foreman Nakashima's chain prison, all players in the area of effect will be stunned.
Simon will attempt to devour low health minions to empower himself.
Simon's minions consume his spew pools to empower themselves, but all that bile damages them over time.
Alluvium Marl's Root Arena summons minions along the outside, split your team efficiently or be prepared for a large wave of extra enemies.
Taxodius will pull the furthest player towards it. If you see it pointing at you, run!
Cilla's Ancient Might buff greatly increases her physical damage and can be purged by enticing her with arcane pools.
The Ancients created more than just the skeletal Guardians, such as the Constructs: living automatons of rock and stone, of which Chardis is the greatest example.
The Tempest's tigers, Joven and Oro, each apply a different negative status effect. Pull them apart to avoid the effects being applied to the same target.
Though she maintains that she has the Dragons' favor, the Empress' reliance on Corruption has warped her dragons into an unrecognizable state.
During Greundgul the Regent’s Leaping Attack, her eye will glow red. Strike it, and the boss will be stunned for a short time.
The Archdeacon's mines can be destroyed before they explode. Your healer will thank you.
